title: ‘This is Me’ Week
excerpt:
On Thursday 10th April 2025, Lea Hall Academy will be hosting a Multi-Culture coffee morning. We would like to invite parents to come and celebrate our students.

This event is part of our week long celebration, ‘This is me’, highlighting the uniqueness of each and everyone, within our school community. Our students have been working hard to create pieces of work that reflect them—something that represents them, their identity.

We hope this event will be a wonderful way to strengthen our sense of community and celebrate the many different backgrounds that enrich our school.

We are also inviting all our students to wear cultural dress or ANY clothing that represents their heritage or identity; whether it is traditional, modern or something meaningful to your identity, students can wear anything that represents them! Not everyone has a specific cultural or religious outfit, and that’s ok – this day is about expression and celebration!

json_ld.name: ‘This is Me’ Week
